entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
